Class StatisticsRequestDispatcherTest

java.lang.Object

      com.imaginea.mongodb.requestdispatchers.StatisticsRequestDispatcherTest

public class StatisticsRequestDispatcherTest
extends BaseRequestDispatcher

Tests the Statistics request dispatcher resource that provides statistics of Database and Collection.

Since:
17 Jul 2011
Author:
Rachit Mittal

Method Summary
 void getCollStatsRequest()
          Tests the GET Request which gets stats of all collections present in Mongo.

          Tests the GET Request which gets stats of all databases present in Mongo.
 void instantiateTestClass()
          Instantiates the object of class under test and also creates an instance of mongo using the mongo service provider that reads from config file in order to test resources.Here we also put our tokenId in session and in mappings defined in UserLogin class so that user is authentcated.

Method Detail

instantiateTestClass

public void instantiateTestClass()
Instantiates the object of class under test and also creates an instance of mongo using the mongo service provider that reads from config file in order to test resources.Here we also put our tokenId in session and in mappings defined in UserLogin class so that user is authentcated.

getdbStatsRequest

public void getdbStatsRequest()
                       throws DatabaseException,
                              org.json.JSONException
Tests the GET Request which gets stats of all databases present in Mongo. Here we construct an empty database first and will test if number of collections in that Db are 0.

Throws:
DatabaseException
org.json.JSONException

getCollStatsRequest

public void getCollStatsRequest()
                         throws CollectionException,
                                org.json.JSONException
Tests the GET Request which gets stats of all collections present in Mongo. Here we construct an empty collection first and will test if number of documents in that collection are 0.

Throws:
CollectionException
org.json.JSONException
